Package ohos.agp.components.element

Class ElementScatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.element.ElementScatter

  • public class ElementScatter
extends Object
    Parses an Element layout file.

    You can call the parse(int) method to generate an Element object using the XML file.

    Since:
    3

        Obtains an ElementScatter instance.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.

        Returns the ElementScatter instance.
        Since:

      • parse

        public Element parse​(int xmlId)
        Parses the XML file to obtain the Element object.

        This method parses the resource ID of the XML file and then reads the attributes to obtain the Element object.

        Parameters:
        xmlId - Indicates the resource ID of the XML file.
        Returns:
        Returns the Element object.
        Since:
        3
